    • Uses of PortI in fr.sorbonne_u.components

      Classes in fr.sorbonne_u.components that implement PortI 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  AbstractPort
      The class AbstractPort represents the basic properties and behaviours of ports in the component model.
      class  IntercessionInboundPort
      The class IntercessionInboundPort defines the inbound port associated the interface IntercessionI.
      class  IntrospectionInboundPort
      The class IntrospectionInboundPort defines the inbound port associated the interface IntrospectionI.
      class  ReflectionInboundPort
      The class ReflectionInboundPort defines the inbound port associated the interface ReflectionI.

    • Uses of PortI in fr.sorbonne_u.components.connectors

      Methods in fr.sorbonne_u.components.connectors with parameters of type PortI 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void AbstractConnector.obeyConnection​(PortI sender, ConnectorI connector)  
      void AbstractConnector.obeyConnection​(PortI sender, String ccname)  
      void ConnectorI.obeyConnection​(PortI sender, ConnectorI connector)
      transmits the connection request to the other port.
      void ConnectorI.obeyConnection​(PortI sender, String ccname)
      transmits the connection request to the other port.
      void AbstractConnector.obeyDisconnection​(PortI sender)  
      void ConnectorI.obeyDisconnection​(PortI sender)
      transmits the disconnection request to the other port.

    • Uses of PortI in fr.sorbonne_u.components.cvm

      Methods in fr.sorbonne_u.components.cvm that return PortI 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static PortI AbstractCVM.getFromLocalRegistry​(String key)
      get the port published under the given key.
      Methods in fr.sorbonne_u.components.cvm with parameters of type PortI 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static void AbstractCVM.localPublishPort​(PortI port)
      publish the port in the local registry.
      static void AbstractCVM.localUnpublishPort​(PortI port)
      unpublish the port in the local registry.
      static void AbstractDistributedCVM.publishPort​(PortI port)
      publish inbound ports (data inbound ports and two way ports) both locally and globally, which includes the RMI registry and the global component registry; outbound ports need not be published globally but only locally (this information is used by the connection builder to decide how the connections to that port must be done).
      static void AbstractDistributedCVM.unpublishPort​(PortI port)
      unpublish previously published inbound ports (data inbound ports and two way ports) both locally and globally, which includes the RMI registry and the global component registry; outbound ports need not be published globally but only locally.

    • Uses of PortI in fr.sorbonne_u.components.ports

      Subinterfaces of PortI in fr.sorbonne_u.components.ports 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      interface  DataInboundPortI
      The interface DataInboundPortI represents the category of ports used by components exchanging data rather than being called for their services.
      interface  DataOutboundPortI
      The interface DataOutboundPortI represents the category of ports used by components exchanging data rather than calling providers for their services.
      interface  InboundPortI
      The interface InboundPortI represents the category of PortI that cater for incoming calls from client components towards the service providers.
      interface  OutboundPortI
      The interface OutboundPortI represents the category of PortI that cater for outgoing calls from a component towards its service providers.
      interface  TwoWayPortI<TWI extends TwoWayCI>
      The interface TwoWayPortI represents the category of PortI that cater for incoming and outgoing calls among components that act both as clients and service providers towards each others on the same interface.
      Classes in fr.sorbonne_u.components.ports that implement PortI 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  AbstractDataInboundPort
      The class AbstractDataInboundPort partially implements an inbound port for data exchanging components.
      class  AbstractDataOutboundPort
      The class AbstractDataOutboundPort partially implements an outbound port for data exchanging components.
      class  AbstractDataTwoWayPort
      The class AbstractDataTwoWayPort partially implements a data two-way port for components exchanging data with each others in a peer-to-peer fashion.
      class  AbstractInboundPort
      The class AbstractInboundPort partially implements an inbound port which implements the offered interface of the provider component so that the provider can be called through this port.
      class  AbstractOutboundPort
      The class AbstractOutboundPort partially implements an outbound port which implements the required interface of the owning component so that it can call its providers through this port.
      class  AbstractTwoWayPort<TWI extends TwoWayCI>
      The class AbstractTwoWayPort partially implements a two-way port for components calling each others in a peer-to-peer fashion.

    • Uses of PortI in fr.sorbonne_u.components.pre.dcc.ports

      Classes in fr.sorbonne_u.components.pre.dcc.ports that implement PortI 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  DynamicComponentCreationInboundPort
      The class DynamicComponentCreationInboundPort implements the inbound port of a DynamicCOmponentCreator component.
      class  DynamicComponentCreationOutboundPort
      The class DynamicComponentCreationOutboundPort implements the outbound port of a DynamicCOmponentCreator client component.

    • Uses of PortI in fr.sorbonne_u.components.reflection.ports
